exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat IHn : (0 < pow2 n)%nat Unable to unify "(1 <= ?M2287 * ?M2288)%nat" with "(1 <= pow2 n + (pow2 n + 0))%nat".
In environment n : nat IHn : (0 < pow2 n)%nat Unable to unify "(0 < pow2 n)%nat" with "(0 < pow2 n + (pow2 n + 0))%nat".

original: induction n. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply Nat.lt_0_mul. + apply Nat.mul_pos_pos; auto. + apply IHn.
